Shell Launch (artview.view)Â¶

Utilities easily running ARTview from shell.

view(containers[, field]) Launch ARTview from shell.
start() Start Qt Application and Menu
execute() Execute Application
addRadar(radar[, field]) add RadarDisplay to Artview Application.
addGrid(grid[, field]) add GridDisplay to Artview Application.
